name: Afra & Tobia Scarpa for Gavina 'Bastiano' Lounge Chair in Leather

condition.details: Refinished. Wear consistent with age and use. Strong and Sound. Good vintage condition with scratches and wear on the leather and wood surface. Original leather upholstery. Images are a part of the item's description, please see pictures in detail.

specifications.rawSpecificationsHTML: Afra & Tobia Scarpa for Gavina 'Bastiano' lounge chair, leather, wood, Italy, 1960 ___________________________________________________________ Beautiful architectural Tobia Scarpa Bastiano leather armchair or lounge chair for Gavina. Structure made of solid wood. Designed by Tobia Scarpa and published by Gavina from 1960 to 1969. Bastiano chair was designed by Tobia Scarpa for Gavina’s experimental design lab in 1960s. This series reimagines Le Corbusier's free cushion concept, translated this time in wood. The armchair style concept features open-design wooden frames with clean lines and deliberate aperture obtaining a geometric appeal. Original foam and feathers cushions upholstered with cognac leather. Manufacturer's label: creaciones MYC España GAVINA Italia. Measures: 78 cm D x 90 cm W x 65 cm H // 30,70 in D x 35,43 in W x 25,59 in H
specifications.rawSpecificationsText:
Afra & Tobia Scarpa for Gavina 'Bastiano' lounge chair, leather, wood, Italy, 1960
___________________________________________________________
Beautiful architectural Tobia Scarpa Bastiano leather armchair or lounge chair for Gavina. Structure made of solid wood.  Designed by Tobia Scarpa and published by Gavina from 1960 to 1969. 
Bastiano chair was designed by Tobia Scarpa for Gavina’s experimental design lab in 1960s. This series reimagines Le Corbusier's free cushion concept, translated this time in wood. The armchair style concept features open-design wooden frames with clean lines and deliberate aperture obtaining a geometric appeal.  
Original foam and feathers cushions upholstered with cognac leather.
Manufacturer's label: creaciones MYC España GAVINA Italia.
Measures: 
78 cm D x 90 cm W x 65 cm H  // 30,70 in D x 35,43 in W x 25,59 in H
